alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 6:27PM MDT until August 03 at 7:30PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Lincoln County in east central Colorado... * Until 730 PM MDT. * At 627 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles southeast of Kutch to 4 miles southeast of Forder to 11 miles north of Ordway, or along a line extending from 30 miles south of Limon to 62 miles east of Colorado Springs to 30 miles northwest of North La Junta, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Wild Horse Point around 645 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Karval. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Wind damage with these storms will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. SEEK SHELTER IMMEDIATELY inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
